text: @kayleighmcenany @realDonaldTrump Did Joe Biden dismantle the pandemic response team? Did he insinuate the disease was a hoax, then say it would disappear “like a miracle”, then consistently contradict his own experts as to the severity of the situation and the availability of tests? Didn’t think so.
